name: Frutti di Mare
description: Dish for 2 guests celebrating the bounty of the ocean with black squid ink pasta and vibrant red sauce.

name: Charcuterie tower
description: An exquisite mix of premium cheeses, berries, grapes, nuts, jam, crackers, and honey, perfect to share for 2-6 guests.

name: Fried avocado with crab and shrimp
description: Crispy avocado slices paired with blue crab meat, shrimp, diced tomatoes, and fresh cucumber, drizzled with chili mayo.

name: Imperial Ice cream
description: A decadent ice cream creation made with champagne, cream, condensed milk, lemon zest, and fresh basil, topped with black caviar and crawfish.

name: Royal Catch Tasting
description: 6 oz lobster tail, tiger shrimp, scallop, Au gratin potato, served with white wine saffron velouté and topped with black caviar.

name: Chef’s Sashimi Set
description: A symphony of the finest cuts including tuna, chu-toro, o-toro, salmon, hamachi, madai, shimaanji, ikura, and Japanese scallops, perfect to share for 3-6 guests.

name: Salmon Royale
description: Premium salmon belly sashimi and artisan-crafted nigiri, crowned with black caviar and shaved fresh truffle.

name: Salt-Baked Branzino
description: A whole large branzino baked in a salt crust, served with sautéed vegetables and lemon-butter sauce, perfect to share for 2-4 guests.

name: Oysters Rockefeller
description: Fresh oysters topped with spinach and hollandaise

name: Shrimp Saganaki
description: Pan seared shrimp with feta cheese

name: Crab Cake
description: Jumbo lump crab cake with remoulade

name: Foie Gras
description: Seared foie gras with cherry gastrique

name: Chilean Sea Bass
description: Pan seared sea bass with seasonal vegetables

name: Lobster Tail
description: Butter poached lobster tail with drawn butter

name: Filet Mignon
description: Prime dry aged filet with house sauce

name: Rack of Lamb
description: Herb crusted rack of lamb with mint jus

name: Branzino
description: Whole branzino baked in sea salt crust

name: Asparagus
description: Grilled asparagus with hollandaise

name: Truffle Mac and Cheese
description: Creamy mac and cheese with black truffle

name: Caviar Potatoes
description: Au gratin potatoes topped with caviar

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm chocolate cake with molten center

name: Crème Brûlée
description: Classic vanilla bean crème brûlée

name: Cheesecake
description: New York style cheesecake with fruit coulis
